Description: Pawn America has 14 years of experience selling a wide range of items online. We take pride in serving you! Check out our huge selection of diverse products. Everything we sell is guaranteed as described or your money back! Your satisfaction is our number one goal. Keep in mind that we offer hassle-free returns with prepaid return shipping. If you have any questions or problems please contact our Customer Service Representatives. _______________________________________________________________ ITEM DESCRIPTION Schecter KM-7 MKII Diamond Series Keith Merrow 7-String Right-Handed Electric Guitar 23823001090 Features: Designed by Keith Merrow for modern metal styles See-Thru Black Pearl Finish Keith Merrow Signature Fishman Fluence active humbucking pickups kick out warm, gritty humbucking tone Push-pull pot for multiple voicings on each of the Fluence pickups 26.5" scale length is ideal for standard and down tuning Ernie Ball compensated nut ensures accurate intonation 5-piece maple/wenge neck is stable, fast, and comfortable Neck-through construction adds sustain Schecter locking tuners provide killer tuning support What's Included: Schecter KM-7 MKII Diamond Series Keith Merrow 7-String Right-Handed Electric Guitar What’s not included: Carrying Case Original Packaging Condition: Good but Used Condition - Schecter Electric Guitar is used and works great - no issues, minor wear from light use. Truss rod adjusting ring shows wear. See pictures for actual condition and items included. 23823001090 Payment & Checkout Checkout: After the auction has ended please click the checkout button to proceed with your payment. Payments: Payments must be received within 3 days. Unpaid cases will automatically be open by eBay 7 days after purchase. Taxes: Sales tax is charged for items shipped to: MN*(6.875%), WI*(5.0%) All Emails and Invoices will be sent to your registered eBay Email Address. If you are not receiving our emails please check your email spam filters. Shipping We Ship to confirmed addresses only! Make any changes to your address before paying. All items will be shipped to your confirmed billing address! Shipping Carriers: SurePost, UPS & USPS 1-6 Day. We choose the shipping carrier at our discretion. Local Pickups: Please contact us for local pickup information. Product Guarantee We offer a 30 Day Money Back Guarantee unless noted "As Is" or "For Parts or Not Working". We do not offer returns on international orders. We do our very best to accurately describe our items, however If you have any problems please contact us right away. Frequently Asked Questions What are your operating hours? M-F 9:00am - 5:00PM Central Standard Time Do you ship internationally? We ship internationally on select items. What is the history of the item? Most of our items are used and we do not know the history. We test them and picture their current condition. What's Included? 99% of the time If it's pictured it's included. Please also read "What's included" How long do I have to make payment? You have 3 days to make payment.
